short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickBookmark lets you quickly add favorite websites and search bookmarks, offering a customizable and efficient way to find sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1.Pop-up window interaction: Open the navigation window on any page.
2.Supports multi-page customized website navigation.
3.Expanded local bookmarks, clear at a glance.
4.Millisecond-level search for custom navigation and bookmarks; find them instantly.
5.Drag-and-drop editing and moving of sites for greater convenience.
6.Fully localized data storage; no personal data is collected.
